---
title: "《游戏王》NR 杯卡组构筑"
subTitle: "N and R Rarity Festival"
date: 2022-03-18T07:54:24+08:00
tags: ["Yu-Gi-Oh", "活动", "构筑"]
series: ["Yu-Gi-Oh"]
related: true
---

3.23 \~ 4.4，Master Duel 开启新活动 NR 杯「N and R Rarity Festival」。\
只能用 N 卡和 R 卡，这可比超量杯有意思多了。

## 推荐构筑
